title: Here Are the 401(k) Contribution Limits for 2023
description: The I.R.S. announced one of its largest increases in decades to caps on retirement contributions, allowing workers with access to the plans to save more.
dc:creator: Lora Kelley
media:credit: Karsten Moran for The New York Times
media:description: The Internal Revenue Service will raise the limit on what Americans can contribute to tax-advantaged retirement accounts next year by nearly 10 percent.
